To select a sequence from the blast results, the matches were sorted by Identity and the sequence with the highest Cover/Identity combination is reported here. For instance, if a match had an Cover/Identity of 95%/97% and another had a values 98%/96%, the last match was taken. In other words we favored the coverage while keeping the Identity as high as possible.
